author: kameshj
msg: Fix #3063 "issue-2897 branch has insecure use of SQL".
Change the signature to return the rooted path segments as a list and
sqlite prepared in clause string of "?".
Remove the security warning comment on doc string.
'get_rooted_path_segments'. Change the query to have a bound parameter on
each rooted path from merge_source and merge_target.
